name: Not Your Santa
description:
This is part of the Secret Santa Jam , 

Controls :

  • Move with arrows.
  • Shoot with space.

Story :

Santa was mind controlled by the evil Guy (yEAH!!) , as the royal sourcerer is your duty to save christmas 

Comments and further discutions

Maybe i will continue with this project, I think i can add more levels , enemies and more changes, improve sound , add a shop coins etc. let me know what do you think.
